title: Are the people in Bronze worse than the people in casuals?
body: I'm scared that my account is about to get banned for boosting. My 1st game of the day was a twisted fate casual. Long game i went 12/14/12. Then my next 3 games i went into ranked and absolutely destroyed them(All Twisted pls dont nerf). I went 12/0/11, 11/3/9, and 5/0/17. Im not boosting pls dont ban me.{{champion:4}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:4}}  BELIEVE IN THE HEART OF THE CARDS!!!!!
